Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought her here to introduce her
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
She's coming to my own lovely restaurant
to work, so I came to help introduce
her to you.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Nice to meet you. I'm <BLUE>Felicity</BLUE>, and I'll
be working at Clement's place.
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>It's lovely to meet you!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just love delicious food, and so if I
have to work somewhere, I want it to be
somewhere surrounded by deliciousness!
<PAGE>
I heard that Clement was opening a
restaurant here and that's what brought
me to town.
<PAGE>
I'm so happy to be able to work with the
amazingly famous Clement!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, I'm so happy you're happy! So happy!
I'll make you whatever you want for your
lunch!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! Thank you! Let's go now!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See you soon, <MYNAME>. I'm staying in the
inn so come and see me if you have the
time.
<PAGE>
I've only just arrived in town so I'd
love having someone to talk to. I'll see
you soon, I hope!

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
